Spirit Tap.name: Spirit Tap
descriptions: Gives you a 20% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after dealing the killing blow to a target.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 seconds.
Gives you a 40% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after dealing the killing blow to a target.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 seconds.
Gives you a 60% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after dealing the killing blow to a target.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 seconds.
Gives you a 80% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after dealing the killing blow to a target.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 seconds.
Gives you a 100% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after dealing the killing blow to a target.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.  Lasts 15 seconds.

Blackout.name: Blackout
descriptions: Gives your Shadow damage spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Shadow damage spells a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Shadow damage spells a 6% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Shadow damage spells a 8% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Shadow damage spells a 10% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

Shadow Affinity.name: Shadow Affinity
descriptions: Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 8%.
Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 16%.
Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 25%.

Pain & Suffering.name: Pain & Suffering
descriptions: Increases the damage of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 5%
Increases the damage of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 10%

Shadow Focus.name: Shadow Focus
descriptions: Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 2%.
Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 4%.
Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 6%.
Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 8%.
Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 10%.

Dark Whispers.name: Dark Whispers
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 2 sec., and increases the amount of targets affected by 5.
Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 4 sec., and increases the amount of targets affected by 10.

Dementia.name: Dementia
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 0.5 sec., and grants your Mind Blast spell a 20% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 1 sec., and grants your Mind Blast spell a 40% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 1.5 sec., and grants your Mind Blast spell a 60% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 2 sec., and grants your Mind Blast spell a 80% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 2.5 sec., and grants your Mind Blast spell a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target.

Mind Flay.name: Mind Flay
descriptions: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 1 Shadow damage over 3 seconds and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

Fade to Black.name: Fade to Black
descriptions: Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by 5 sec.
Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by 10 sec.

Shadow Reach.name: Shadow Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 6%.
Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 13%.
Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 20%.

Shadow Weaving.name: Shadow Weaving
descriptions: Your Shadow damage spells have a 20% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 seconds.  Stacks up to 5 times.

Your Shadow damage spells have a 40% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 seconds.  Stacks up to 5 times.

Your Shadow damage spells have a 60% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 seconds.  Stacks up to 5 times.

Your Shadow damage spells have a 80% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 seconds.  Stacks up to 5 times.

Your Shadow damage spells have a 100% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.  This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 seconds.  Stacks up to 5 times.

Shadow Word: Silence.name: Shadow Word: Silence
descriptions: A single word of darkness silences the target, preventing spellcasting for 6 seconds.

Vampiric Embrace.name: Vampiric Embrace
descriptions: Afflicts your target with Shadow energy that causes all nearby allies to be healed for 20% of any Shadow spell damage you deal for 1 minute. Can only affect one target at a time.

Shadow Shock.name: Shadow Shock
descriptions: Causes 5% of shadow damage dealt to targets affected by Vampiric Embrace to damage all enemies within 10 yards of the afflicted target.
Causes 10% of shadow damage dealt to targets affected by Vampiric Embrace to damage all enemies within 10 yards of the afflicted target.
Causes 15% of shadow damage dealt to targets affected by Vampiric Embrace to damage all enemies within 10 yards of the afflicted target.
Causes 20% of shadow damage dealt to targets affected by Vampiric Embrace to damage all enemies within 10 yards of the afflicted target.
Causes 25% of shadow damage dealt to targets affected by Vampiric Embrace to damage all enemies within 10 yards of the afflicted target.

Darkness.name: Darkness
descriptions: Increases your Shadow spell damage by 2%.
Increases your Shadow spell damage by 4%.
Increases your Shadow spell damage by 6%.
Increases your Shadow spell damage by 8%.
Increases your Shadow spell damage by 10%.

Shadowform.name: Shadowform
descriptions: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing Physical damage done to you by 15%.  However, you may not cast Holy spells while in this form.
